ygData.subject: RE: Also...
ygData.msgSnippet: So, you are saying that you need 2 silks to make a swatch... and you need two swatches, and a pattern to make the tunic and leggings... Well, my sewing kit has
ygData.messageBody:
So, you are saying that you need 2 silks to make a swatch...
and you need two swatches, and a pattern to make the tunic and leggings...

Well, my sewing kit has only 2 slots. How can I combine 2 swatches and a
pattern if I only have 2 slots in my kit?

Do you need a different kit to make this armor?

-----Original Message-----
From: ablair@... [mailto:ablair@...]
Sent: Friday, September 17, 1999 9:56 AM
To: eq-monks@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ-Monks] Also...


From: ablair@...

You need 2 swatches to make the tunic and the leggings.

I just gotta say, even though I have a LJ, I love the
brown robe look!
